channel.title: CVE Feed for Jcodex -- WooCommerce Checkout Field Editor (Checkout Manager)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jcodex -- WooCommerce Checkout Field Editor (Checkout Manager)

item.title: CVE-2024-31262|2024-08-02T01:46:04.936Z -- jcodex -- woocommerce%20checkout%20field%20editor%20%28checkout%20manager%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jcodex WooCommerce Checkout Field Editor (Checkout Manager).This issue affects WooCommerce Checkout Field Editor (Checkout Manager): from n/a through 2.1.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-31262|2024-06-04T17:36:52.914Z -- jcodex -- woocommerce%20checkout%20field%20editor%20%28checkout%20manager%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jcodex WooCommerce Checkout Field Editor (Checkout Manager).This issue affects WooCommerce Checkout Field Editor (Checkout Manager): from n/a through 2.1.8.
